00011 class CMPostgreSQLQuery implements CMQueryProtocol {
00012  
00018  public static function Version() {
00019   return "1.0";
00020  }
00021  
00027  public static function Since() {
00028   return "1.0";
00029  }
00030  
00034  private $query = false;
00035  
00039  private $a = array();
00040  
00050  public function CMPostgreSQLQuery($q, $a = array()) {
00051   $this->query = $q;
00052   $this->a = $a;
00053  }
00054  
00087  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00088   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00089    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00090    
00091   if(!$this->query)
00092    return false;
00093   
00094   if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00095    $r = pg_fetch_assoc($this->query);
00096   elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00097    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00098   elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00099    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00100    if(!$r) return false;
00101    $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00102   } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00103    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00104    if(!$r) return false;
00105    $r = $r[0];
00106   } else $r = false;
00107   
00108   // apply formatter
00109   if($formatter !== false)
00110    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00111   
00112   return $r;
00113  }
00114  
00123  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00124   if(!$this->query)
00125    return false;
00126   $r = array();
00127   
00128   if($direction == 'single')
00129    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00130   
00131   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00132    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00133     $r[] = $row;
00134    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00135     if(is_array($row)) {
00136      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00137       $r[] = $v;
00138     } else $r[] = $row;
00139    } else return false;
00140   }
00141   
00142   return $r;
00143  }
00144  
00159  public function availableMethods() {
00160   return array('availableMethods', 'affectedRows', 'fetch', 'fetchAll', 'totalRows');
00161  }
00162  
00170  public function affectedRows() {
00171   return pg_affected_rows($this->query);
00172  }
00173  
00181  public function totalRows() {
00182   return pg_num_rows($this->query);
00183  }
00184  
00190  public function success() {
00191   return $this->query !== false;
00192  }
00193  
00197  public function __toString() {
00198   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00199  }
